from yolobit import *
import machine
from i2c_motor_driver import MotorDriver4Channel
from mqtt import *
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from hcsr04 import HCSR04
import _thread

driver = MotorDriver4Channel(machine.SoftI2C(scl=machine.Pin(22), sda=machine.Pin(21), freq=100000))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def conveyor_belt(working, speed):
  global left, object2, detect_object, default_conveyor_belt, yellow_stack, has_object, blue_stack, result, white_stack
  if working:
    driver.set_motor(0,speed)
  else:
    driver.set_motor(0,0)

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__classification_(result):
  global working, speed, detect_object, yellow_stack, blue_stack, white_stack, c_E1_BA_A3m_bi_E1_BA_BFn_kho_E1_BA_A3ng_c_C3_A1ch, x, y, has_object, default_conveyor_belt, left, object2, th_C3_B4ng_tin
  has_object = 0
  classify(result)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def initalize_distance_sensor():
  global working, speed, left, object2, detect_object, default_conveyor_belt, yellow_stack, has_object, blue_stack, result, white_stack
  my_0Dx_F_Vp2_o__0osYeQW = HCSR04(trigger_pin=pin6.pin, echo_pin=pin3.pin)
  qG_mLhnO_5E__fbGq_60a5_a = HCSR04(trigger_pin=pin13.pin, echo_pin=pin10.pin)
  _5Bj_5D_S3Q_HB_k_2z9_25_MV = HCSR04(trigger_pin=pin15.pin, echo_pin=pin14.pin)
  _yhH_M1_Fz_60w_d_DcKz7 = HCSR04(trigger_pin=pin12.pin, echo_pin=pin16.pin)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def camera():
  global working, speed, left, object2, detect_object, default_conveyor_belt, yellow_stack, has_object, blue_stack, result, white_stack
  if my_0Dx_F_Vp2_o__0osYeQW.distance_cm() < 5:
    has_object = 1
    driver.set_motor_time(0,(-25), 0.5)
    conveyor_belt(0, default_conveyor_belt)
  else:
    has_object = 0
    conveyor_belt(1, default_conveyor_belt)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def wifi2():
  global working, speed, left, object2, detect_object, default_conveyor_belt, yellow_stack, has_object, blue_stack, result, white_stack
  mqtt.connect_wifi('VNPT-VINH CHANH', '0967030483')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='mqtt.ohstem.vn', port=1883, username='nguyenducbaolam', password='0339588476')

# Mô tả hàm này...
def initlalize_distance_sensor():
  global working, speed, left, object2, detect_object, default_conveyor_belt, yellow_stack, has_object, blue_stack, result, white_stack
  pass

def threadFunction__dz_60A0osBr_bd____5B_60pO():

  mqtt.check_message()

_thread.start_new_thread(threadFunction__dz_60A0osBr_bd____5B_60pO,())

# Mô tả hàm này...
def classify_with_bars(left):
  global working, speed, object2, detect_object, default_conveyor_belt, yellow_stack, has_object, blue_stack, result, white_stack
  if left:
    driver.set_motor(1,50)
    while (qG_mLhnO_5E__fbGq_60a5_a.distance_cm()) > 5:
      pass
    driver.set_motor_time(1,(-10), 0.2)
  else:
    driver.set_motor(1,(-50))
    while (_yhH_M1_Fz_60w_d_DcKz7.distance_cm()) > 5:
      pass
    driver.set_motor_time(1,10, 0.2)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def classify(object2):
  global working, speed, left, detect_object, default_conveyor_belt, yellow_stack, has_object, blue_stack, result, white_stack
  conveyor_belt(0, default_conveyor_belt)
  if object2 == 0:
    conveyor_belt(1, default_conveyor_belt)
    while (_5Bj_5D_S3Q_HB_k_2z9_25_MV.distance_cm()) > 5:
      pass
    conveyor_belt(0, default_conveyor_belt)
  else:
    if object2 == 1:
      object2 = 0
    else:
      object2 = 1
    classify_with_bars(object2)

if True:
  default_conveyor_belt = 50
  initalize_distance_sensor()

while True:
  camera()
  if has_object:
    mqtt.on_receive_message('classification', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__classification_)
